author: Special Correspondent
text: K. Balan (27) of Thattankulam and P. Murugananthan (27), who were proceeding from Oddanchathiram to Vedasandur on a motorcycle were hit by a van at Ayyanarkoil on Friday evening. The two died on the spot. Vedasandur police registered a case and arrested van driver Krishnan.
title: Two youths killed
